description: Impact Briefing — Capitol Fund Quarterly Update

backFields.label: About This Event
backFields.value:
Join us for the Capitol Fund Quarterly Update — an Impact Briefing showcasing our regenerative capital framework progress. This event is exclusive to LIFT Certificate Early Adopters (Series 2025Q4).

Learn about:
• Regenerative Capital Framework
• Capitol Fund Investment Strategy
• Community Impact Metrics
• Q4 2025 Performance Review

backFields.label: Venue Details
backFields.value:
Bell Tower Hall
Frederick, Maryland

Walking distance from downtown Frederick. Parking available on-site.

Parking: Free parking in adjacent lot (Market Street entrance)

backFields.label: VIP Access
backFields.value:
As an Early Adopter, you have:
• VIP Lounge access (Code: VIP2025)
• Priority seating
• Exclusive Q&A with speakers
• Complimentary refreshments

backFields.label: Contact & Support
backFields.value:
Event Organizer: LocalFund
Phone: +1 (949) 202-6850
Email: hello@exchangereserve.org

For event-day assistance, text HELP to the number above.

backFields.label: Your LIFT Certificate
backFields.value:
This pass is tied to your LIFT Certificate representing participation in Exchange Reserve's regenerative capital framework.

Serial: POSTER-DEMO-2025-001
Verify: https://exchangereserve.org/verify/POSTER-DEMO-2025-001

locations.relevantText: Welcome to Bell Tower Hall! Your Impact Briefing starts soon. Show this pass at VIP registration.
